thoughts.text: Since the browse_website command was not helpful, I think I'll use the clone_repository command to clone a travel repository from GitHub. This will allow me to access reliable information on top travel destinations.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the clone_repository command to clone a travel repository from GitHub will allow me to access reliable information on top travel destinations and plan my travels more effectively.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the clone_repository command to clone a travel repository from GitHub
- Search for information on the top travel destinations mentioned in the Forbes article
- Read the search results to learn more about the destinations and plan my travels more effectively
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that the repository is reliable and that I am not relying solely on one source of information.
thoughts.speak: Since the browse_website command was not helpful, I think I'll use the clone_repository command to clone a travel repository from GitHub and access reliable information on top travel destinations.
